item.title: 加密货币 ETF 希望者认为美国证券交易委员会的最新举措改变了节奏
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）选中接替加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）担任美国证券交易委员会主席的人选还未正式就职，但该监管机构已经在批准一些新的加密货币交易所交易基金的道路上迈出了渐进的步伐。【原文：Donald Trump’s pick to succeed Gary Gensler as chair of the SEC hasn’t been officially installed yet, but the regulator is already taking incremental steps on a path to approving a handful of new cryptocurrency exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 马斯克 "收购 "要约在即，美国联邦政府员工人数创历史新高
item.description: 周五公布的新数据显示，1 月份美国政府雇员人数达到二战以来非人口普查年的最高水平，唐纳德-特朗普总统上任后希望裁减十分之一的联邦雇员。【原文：The US government head count grew to its highest level in any non-census year since World War II in January, according to new figures released Friday, as President Donald Trump took office looking to cut one in 10 federal employees.】

item.title: 风险投资加大对拉美金融科技贷款的投入
item.description: 风险投资公司计划加大对提供贷款和人工智能产品的拉美初创企业的投资力度，而美国利率的降低可能会在该地区经历一段枯竭期后，最快在今年为更多的首次公开募股打开大门。【原文：Venture capital firms plan to invest more in Latin American startups that offer loans and artificial intelligence products, while lower US interest rates could open the door to more initial public offerings as soon as this year after a dry spell in the region.】

item.title: 网络攻击多年后，Turn/River 同意收购 SolarWinds
item.description: Turn/River Capital 同意收购 SolarWinds 公司，交易价值 44 亿美元（包括债务），四年多前，这家软件供应商曾是俄罗斯网络攻击的中心。【原文：Turn/River Capital agreed to buy SolarWinds Corp. in a deal worth $4.4 billion, including debt, more than four years after the software provider was at the center of a Russian cyber-attack.】

item.title: Circle 的稳定币挽回了因加密货币崩溃而失去的市场份额
item.description: Circle Internet Financial Ltd. 的 USDC 稳定币已经赚回了它在 FTX 倒闭后加密货币价格暴跌时失去的所有市值。【原文：Circle Internet Financial Ltd.’s USDC stablecoin has gained back all of the market value it lost after the collapse in crypto prices following the failure of FTX.】

item.title: 苹果公司被英国勒令建立后门以获取用户数据
item.description: 英国政府已下令苹果公司建立一个后门，允许其访问全球用户数据，此举可能引发这家 iPhone 制造商历史上最大的隐私权争夺战之一。【原文：The UK government has ordered Apple Inc. to build a backdoor to give it access to global user data, in a move that could spark one of the biggest privacy fights in the iPhone maker’s history.】

item.title: 关税延迟刺激农作物反弹至数月高位后有所回落
item.description: 在本周早些时候美国推迟对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税后，农产品市场出现反弹，交易商等待有关需求的更多线索，因此周五谷物和油籽期货价格有所回落。【原文：Grain and oilseed futures eased Friday as traders waited for more clues on demand after agriculture markets rallied earlier in the week when the US delayed tariffs on Canada and Mexico.】

item.title: 美联储库格勒关注通胀进展和政策不确定性
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）表示，通胀已大幅下降，但她警告说，近期进展缓慢，仍存在很大的不确定性。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said inflation has fallen significantly, but warned recent progress has been slow and that considerable uncertainty remains.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务救援竞标者怀疑出售程序的可行性
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的救援竞标者之一已致函伦敦高等法院，质疑在四月前为这家陷入困境的公用事业公司找到新股权的可行性。【原文：One of the rescue bidders for Thames Water has written to the High Court in London questioning the feasibility of finding new equity for the beleaguered utility by April.】

item.title: 美元升至日内高点，交易商猜测关税问题
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）实施关税计划的不确定性，美元升至当日高点，导致全球货币同业下滑。【原文：The US dollar rose to the day’s high on uncertainty surrounding President Donald Trump’s plans to implement tariffs, sending global currency peers sliding.】

item.title: 比尔-阿克曼称潘兴广场持有 3030 万股优步股票
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的对冲基金潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）持有 3030 万股优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Bill Ackman’s hedge fund Pershing Square Capital Management owns 30.3 million shares of Uber Technologies Inc., the billionaire investor disclosed on Friday.】

item.title: 加拿大禁止在政府设备上使用 DeepSeek 聊天机器人
item.description: 加拿大联邦政府压制了中国软件公司 DeepSeek 上个月发布的一款聊天机器人应用程序。【原文：The Canadian federal government suppressed a chatbot application released last month by Chinese software company DeepSeek.】

item.title: 首席执行官和特鲁多试图制定超越美国的加拿大出口战略
item.description: 面对特朗普政府的关税威胁，加拿大领导人周五齐聚一堂，制定将出口从美国转移到其他市场的战略；尽管有些人认为这一努力来得太晚了。【原文：In the face of tariff threats from the Trump administration, Canadian leaders gathered Friday to map out a strategy for shifting exports from the US to other markets — even if some think that effort is coming too late.】

item.title: 美国梦大型购物中心的新泽西州债券未能在二月份付款
item.description: 根据一份证券文件，为资助 "美国梦 "大型购物中心而发行的市政债券没有支付 2 月份的利息。【原文：Municipal bonds issued to finance the American Dream megamall didn’t make their February interest payment, according to a securities filing.】

item.title: 马斯克的 DOGE 向 CFPB 发起进攻，意图关闭 CFPB
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "政府效率部"（Department of Government Efficiency）已进驻消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau），这是解散该机构的第一步。【原文：Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency has embedded itself inside the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, the first step toward dismantling the agency.】

item.title: 我们正在为人类大脑的逻辑引擎重新布线
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 销售额增长，Cloudflare 股价创近一年来最大涨幅
item.description: Cloudflare 公司宣布第四季度营收超出预期，股价创下近一年来最大涨幅。【原文：Cloudflare Inc.’s shares surged the most in almost a year, after the company announced fourth-quarter revenue that beat expectations.】

item.title: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩谈如何让欧洲再次增长
item.description:
央行目前是如何考虑政策的？【原文：

How the central bank is thinking of policy right now.

item.title: 英国货币经理人称赞工党将监管重点转向增长
item.description: 资产管理公司的老板们对工党政府为促进经济增长和提高英国金融中心的竞争力所做的努力表示赞赏。【原文：Asset management bosses have praised the Labour government’s efforts to boost economic growth and the competitiveness of the UK’s financial center.】

item.title: 特斯拉销量大跌，股价将迎来大选以来最差一周
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）为重塑美国联邦政府员工队伍所做的努力引发了一个又一个的头条新闻，而他的电动汽车公司的股价却有望创下自美国总统大选以来最差的一周表现。【原文：While Elon Musk has been generating headline after headline for his efforts to reshape the US federal workforce, the stock of his electric-car company is on track for its worst weekly performance since the US presidential election.】

item.title: 危地马拉将增加开支以吸收美国驱逐出境人数的激增
item.description: 危地马拉正在动用国库资金，增加用于创造就业和社会计划的开支，以应对美国驱逐出境人数激增的情况。【原文：Guatemala is dipping into government coffers to boost spending on job creation and social programs as it braces for a spike in deportations from the US.】

item.title: 一月份伦敦黄金外流创纪录，争相运往美国
item.description: 由于交易商急于将贵金属运往美国以规避关税风险并获取溢价，1月份伦敦金库中储存的黄金数量减少了490万金衡盎司，这是自2016年有记录以来的最大月度降幅。【原文：The amount of gold stored in London vaults fell by 4.9 million troy ounces in January, the largest monthly decline since records began in 2016, as traders rushed to ship the precious metal to the US to avoid tariff risks and capture premium prices.】

item.title: 玻利维亚针对洗钱指控为中央银行购买黄金辩护
item.description: 在反对党议员指控玻利维亚中央银行购买国产黄金的做法可能构成黄金洗钱之后，玻利维亚政府为这种做法的合法性进行了辩护。【原文：Bolivia’s government has defended the legality of domestically produced gold purchased by the central bank, following allegations by opposition lawmakers that the practice may constitute gold laundering.】

item.title: 普利司通利比里亚种植园工人在谈判中停止罢工
item.description: 数以千计的凡士通利比里亚有限责任公司（Firestone Liberia LLC）橡胶种植园合同工于 1 月 30 日举行罢工，抗议恶劣的工作条件，他们于周五暂停了劳动行动，等待与公司管理层的进一步谈判。【原文：Thousands of Firestone Liberia LLC’s rubber plantation contract workers who went on strike on Jan. 30 to protest against poor working conditions paused their labor action on Friday pending further negotiations with the company’s management.】

item.title: 价格忧虑导致美国消费者信心降至七个月低点
item.description: 由于对关税的担忧导致短期通胀预期飙升，美国消费者情绪在 2 月初下滑至七个月低点。【原文：US consumer sentiment slumped in early February to a seven-month low on a spike in short-term inflation expectations related to concerns about tariffs.】

item.title: 面临 "巨大 "技术挑战，空客推迟氢飞机研发
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）表示，由于技术上的障碍，该公司最雄心勃勃的未来推进项目之一--使用氢气为飞机提供动力--的进展比计划要慢，这使该行业为清洁航空旅行所做的努力遭遇挫折。【原文：Airbus SE said that one of its most ambitious projects for future propulsion — using hydrogen to power an aircraft — is progressing slower than planned because of the technological hurdles involved, dealing a setback to the industry’s efforts to clean up air travel.】

item.title: 在谈判取得突破之际，LIV 高尔夫球手将赢得更多大满贯赛参赛席位
item.description: LIV Golf 正在为其明星球手争取更多参加世界顶级赛事的名额，为这个由沙特支持的独立联盟与美国和欧洲巡回赛的统一铺平道路。【原文：LIV Golf is closing in on more places for its star golfers at the world’s premier competitions, paving the way for unification between the breakaway Saudi-backed league and the US and European tours.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德的财富部门目标从私人现金中获取 1000 亿美元
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）首席执行官约翰-斯威尼（John Sweeney）表示，该公司的私人财富部门希望在未来五年内资产规模达到 1000 亿美元。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management’s private wealth arm aspires to reach $100 billion in assets in the next five years, its chief executive John Sweeney said.】

item.title: 印度加大刺激力度以刺激疲软经济
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）指望通过减税和降息双管齐下的刺激措施来扭转印度经济放缓的局面，但投资者可能需要更多的说服力来证明这些措施是足够的。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi is counting on a two-pronged stimulus of tax and interest rate cuts to turn around India’s slowing economy, but investors may need more convincing that the measures will be enough.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收的关税远不足以为减税买单
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普上周末威胁要对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收关税，金融市场为之哗然，但据经济学家估计，这些关税远不足以抵消美国延长其即将到期的2017年减税政策所需的成本。【原文：The tariffs President Donald Trump threatened against Canada, Mexico and China over the weekend roiled financial markets but they fall far short of duties the US would need to offset the cost of extending his expiring 2017 tax cuts, economists estimate.】
